document_data.name: Hero's Reward
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hero's Reward''' was tavern found in the small village of [[Newfort]] in the [[Silver Marches]] during the 14{{th}} and 15{{th}} centuries [[DR]].

Interior.Atmosphere: The taproom of the tavern was described as being rather cozy.

document_data.Services: Throughout its history, the tavern provided tasty drinks and delicious food to its patrons.
document_data.History:
Hero's Reward was first established by Newfort's founder and first mayor, [[Trevis Uhl]], in the {{YearlinkName|1371}}.

In the years following the [[War of the Silver Marches]], the tavern was run by the well-liked [[half-elf]] [[Delf Dereldar]].

Notable Patrons.15{{th}} Century: * [[Jorok Narm]], the constable of Newfort who played regular games of [[chess (game)|chess]] with Delf.

document_data.Rumors & Legends: The tavern's name was a wink and a not to the ex-soldiers of [[Zhentil Keep]] that resettled in Newfort in the years following the keep's destruction, many of whom were patrons at Trevis' previous establishment within the [[Moonsea]] city.
